title: Educating national security leaders on artificial intelligence
summary: MIT has developed a three-day custom program called "Artificial Intelligence for National Security Leaders" (AI4NSL) to educate military and government leaders on the basics of AI, machine learning, and data science. The program aims to help leaders understand the benefits and potential negative consequences of AI in the context of national security. The course covers technical topics in AI and organizational challenges, and includes breakout sessions for collaboration and problem-solving. The curriculum will be updated to keep up with the rapidly changing landscape of AI and national security.
